      • PGPAuthenticationEncrypt

        public static byte[] PGPAuthenticationEncrypt​(byte[] message,
                                              java.security.Key privateKey)
                                       throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        PGP encryption to authenticate the sender.
        Parameters:
        message - Message to send
        privateKey - Private key of sender
        Returns:
        A signed hash and the original message, concatenated together
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException

      • PGPAuthenticationDecrypt

        public static byte[] PGPAuthenticationDecrypt​(byte[] concatMessage,
                                              java.security.Key senderPublicKey)
                                       throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                              javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException,
                                              java.security.InvalidKeyException
        PGP decryption to authenticate sender.
        Parameters:
        concatMessage - The signed hash and the message
        senderPublicKey - The public key of the sender
        Returns:
        The message only if authenticated. returns null if not authenticated
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException
        java.security.InvalidKeyException

      • PGPConfidentialityEncrypt

        public static byte[] PGPConfidentialityEncrypt​(byte[] message,
                                               javax.crypto.SecretKey sharedKey,
                                               java.security.Key publicKey)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        PGP encryption for confidentiality The message is compressed and encrypted with the shared key Then the shared key is encrypted with the public key of the reciever, and concatenated to the message
        Parameters:
        message - The message to encrypt
        sharedKey - The shared key between Alice and Bob
        publicKey - The receiver's public key
        Returns:
        A compressed and encrypted (with shared key) version of the message, concatenated to the shared key (encrypted with the public key)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • PGPConfidentialityDecrypt

        public static byte[] PGPConfidentialityDecrypt​(byte[] encrypted,
                                               java.security.Key privateKey)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        PGP decryption for confidentiality
        Parameters:
        encrypted - The shared key and encrypted compressed message
        privateKey - The private key of the receiver
        Returns:
        the decrypted message
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
